item.title: Project DA-FANH Sunsetting in July 2025
item.description:
Project DA-FANH Comes Full Circle

Project DA-FANH, funded by a USDA HSI Education Grant from August 2021 to July 2025, was established to support student success and improve graduation outcomes through access to pre-professional experiential learning and academic development opportunities.

Our mission was to enhance education at the intersection of Data Analytics and the Food, Agriculture, Natural Resources, and Human Sciences (FANH) disciplines. Over the course of four years, the project offered internships, workshops, and curriculum innovations that opened new doors for studentsâ€”many of which have since been institutionalized.
